DOC.brief_title: Prostaglandin Metabolite Urine Samples From Patients With Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine level prostaglandin E_2 metabolite ( PGE-M ) 24-hour urine sample collect prior surgery chemotherapy patient ovarian cancer . - Determine cyclooxygenase-1 ( COX-1 ) cyclooxygenase-2 ( COX-2 ) expression western blot immunohistochemistry ( IHC ) ovarian tumor tissue sample match normal ovarian tissue sample , available , patient . - Correlate urine PGE-M level correspond tissue COX-1 COX-2 level urine tissue sample patient . OUTLINE : This pilot study . Patients submit 24-hour urine specimens prior surgery evaluation urinary level prostaglandin E_2 metabolite ( PGE-M ) . Patients also undergo assessment tissue obtain time surgery , include ovarian tumor tissue , normal surface ovarian epithelium tissue ( available ) , fix tissue embed paraffin block . Tissue sample analyze western blot IHC cyclooxygenase-1 cyclooxygenase-2 expression .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis know suspected ovarian cancer Age great 17 year Pregnant nursing Taking steroid nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) regular basis . PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : No concurrent chronic use steroid NSAIDs
